LanguageData.DMSRC_Mission_WaveDesc: Enemy reinforcements are moving towards this area.
LanguageData.DMSRC_MessageLadarTriggered: A perimeter scanner has detected an invisible creature.
LanguageData.DMSRC_RenegadesDialod_RequestsDisabled: Should be ally to make requests
LanguageData.DMSRC_RenegadesContactsLetter_Text:
Renegades contacted you, offering an allience. They will give you access to trade requests and, in the future, military aid.

If you will accept this offer Colonial fleet would become permanent enemy.

If you will reject this offer renegades will not do anything, unless you'll become Colonial fleet ally.
LanguageData.DMSRC_MilitaryAid: Military aid with power of {0} (cost {1} goodwill)
LanguageData.DMSRC_BeamDefenceDesc: How much projectiles can be intercepted.\n\nInterception is not guaranteed.
LanguageData.DMSRC_ProducerResultDesc: A resource which will be produced by artificial pregnancy.\n\nCurrent: {0}
LanguageData.DMSRC_MessagePregnancyDisabled: {PAWN_labelShort}'s artificial pregnancy stopped, since {BUILDING_labelShort} is not working.
LanguageData.DMSRC_MessagePregnancyReenabled: {PAWN_labelShort}'s artificial pregnancy continues, since {BUILDING_labelShort} is working again.
LanguageData.DMSRC_ForbiddenTech: This technology is forbidden by Colonial fleet, usage of it will make them hostile.
LanguageData.DMSRC_ErrorWhileRecalculatingTiles: Broadcast towers will not work. Report this issue to developer
